0x36.description: Load immediate 8-bit value (n) into memory address (IX + d)

0x46.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into B

0x4E.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into C

0x56.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into D

0x5E.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into E

0x66.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into H (Undocumented/H=IXh)

0x6E.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into L (Undocumented/L=IXl)

0x70.description: Load B into memory address (IX + d)

0x71.description: Load C into memory address (IX + d)

0x72.description: Load D into memory address (IX + d)

0x73.description: Load E into memory address (IX + d)

0x74.description: Load H into memory address (IX + d) (Undocumented)

0x75.description: Load L into memory address (IX + d) (Undocumented)

0x77.description: Load A into memory address (IX + d)

0x7C.description: Load byte from (IX + d) into A

0x86.description: Add byte at (IX + d) to A

0x8E.description: Add with Carry byte at (IX + d) to A

0x96.description: Subtract byte at (IX + d) from A

0x9E.description: Subtract with Carry byte at (IX + d) from A

0xA6.description: Logical AND byte at (IX + d) with A

0xAE.description: Logical XOR byte at (IX + d) with A

0xB6.description: Logical OR byte at (IX + d) with A

0xBE.description: Compare byte at (IX + d) with A

0xE3.description: Exchange IX with top of stack
